request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X 'POST' \
  'http://localhost:8090/v1/voiceboat/api-tools' \
  -H 'accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '  {
    "name": "get_flight_booking_by_pnr",
    "description": "Get flight booking details by PNR",
    "inputSchema": "{\n   \"$schema\" : \"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema\",\n   \"type\" : \"object\",\n   \"properties\" : {\n     \"pnr\" : {\n       \"type\" : \"string\"\n     }\n   },\n   \"required\" : [ \"pnr\" ],\n   \"additionalProperties\" : false\n }\n",
    "returnDirect": false,
    "baseUrl": "http://localhost:8092",
    "httpMethod": "GET",
    "path": "/v1/airline/bookings/{pnr}"
  }'

Generated from cURL: curl -X 'POST' \
  'http://localhost:8090/v1/voiceboat/api-tools' \
  -H 'accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "name": "cancel_booking_by_pnr",
    "description": "Cancel a flight booking by PNR",
    "inputSchema": "{\n  \"$schema\" : \"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema\",\n  \"type\" : \"object\",\n  \"properties\" : {\n    \"pnr\" : {\n      \"type\" : \"string\"\n    }\n  },\n  \"required\" : [ \"pnr\" ],\n  \"additionalProperties\" : false\n}\n",
    "returnDirect": false,
    "baseUrl": "http://localhost:8092",
    "httpMethod": "PUT",
    "path": "/v1/airline/bookings/{pnr}/cancel"
  }'
